modules.sql: WITH purpose_counts AS (SELECT bv.branch_id, bv.visit_purpose, bv.as_of, COUNT(*) AS visit_count, SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (PARTITION BY bv.branch_id, bv.as_of) AS total_branch_visits FROM branch_visits bv GROUP BY bv.branch_id, bv.visit_purpose, bv.as_of) SELECT pc.branch_id, b.branch_name, pc.visit_purpose, pc.as_of, pc.visit_count FROM purpose_counts pc JOIN branches b ON pc.branch_id = b.branch_id AND pc.as_of = b.as_of ORDER BY pc.as_of, pc.branch_id, pc.visit_purpose
